title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide the correct answer.

The response provides the correct answer.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide the correct answer and a valid justification.

  • Negative. The temperature of the surrounding solution increases, indicating that there is a thermal energy transfer from the system to the surroundings as dissolution occurs.

The response provides the correct answer and a valid justification.

  • Negative. The temperature of the surrounding solution increases, indicating that there is a thermal energy transfer from the system to the surroundings as dissolution occurs.
